topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Configuring the DCN Metadata Agent

b.i: For a KVM and ESX cloud topology

section.p: After deploying the KVM cloud, on each compute node, update the following lines in the /etc/default/nuage-metadata-agent to reflect:

ol.li:
Append v2.0 to the Keystone URL: # NOVA_OS_AUTH_URL=http://10.30.3.103:35357 NOVA_OS_AUTH_URL=http://10.30.3.103:5000/v2.0
Where NOVA_OS_AUTH_URL is Identity service endpoint, which the nova client uses for authentication.
Change the Nova API endpoint to internalURL: # NOVA_API_ENDPOINT_TYPE=publicURL NOVA_API_ENDPOINT_TYPE=internalURL

body.p: Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
